attributes.action: Introduce Non-Means Tested Childcare Fees to all parents under 25 in full time education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to consider extending the governments 'Care 2 Learn' scheme to include parents up to the age of 25 and in education at University aswell as education at colleges and schools. To insure that the countries young people are getting the education they desire rather than becoming unemployed or in unskilled low paid employment.
